title: Local Newspaper header "Mitt i" bold sans serif
content:
Any ideas on the this ’charming’ sans serif which is used for all issues of the local newspaper Mitt i in Sweden?

More covers can be seen here: [http://www.mitti.se/sv/Lokaltidningen/Sodermalm/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060307/http:/www.mitti.se/sv/Lokaltidningen/Sodermalm/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mitti_3802.png)

Thanks

Seb

 [‹ Please ID this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060307/http:/typophile.com/node/41796 "Go to previous forum topic") [number - font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060307/http:/typophile.com/node/41788 "Go to next forum topic")
author: all about seb

comments.content: Thanks Akira, you always seem to have the answers :)
